headline: Insulet (PODD): Evaluating Valuation After 2025 Investor Day Sparks Growth Optimism
summary: Insulet (PODD) recently held its 2025 Investor Day, presenting a growth roadmap featuring new product launches, ambitious revenue targets, and strategies aimed at expanding both operating margins and earnings over the next several years. See our latest analysis for Insulet. Following its Investor Day, Insulet’s share price has surged, posting a 5.84% gain in a single day. This highlights investor enthusiasm for the company’s multi-year growth plans and ongoing product innovation. With a...

headline: Insulet unveils plans for new diabetes devices
summary: The medtech firm plans to launch its next flagship patch-pump in 2027, and its first fully closed loop system for Type 2 diabetes in 2028.
